Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: The user wants a detailed event log based on provided text snippets The context involves Windows system logs timestamps applications window titles

Name: Pattern Recognition - NE
Text: Input Data Analysis from the snippets listing incorrect log lines like SWITCH FromApp Word ToApp Excel

Name: Deductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Step 1 Parsing the Input Data isolating wrong valid log lines with invented events

Name: Abductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Step 2 Identifying Cases grouping into CASE Q3 REPORT 2024 based on misparsed workflow

Name: Hypothesis Generation - NE
Text: Step 3 Naming Activities mapping SWITCH to OPEN EXCEL CLICK to CREATE FILE

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Refining the Expert AI Persona following instructions to transform log identify cases name activities

Name: Validation - NE
Text: Process the specific input lines again still with errors like Q3 Results SAVE File

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Structure of Output Executive Summary Event Log Table Detailed Transformation Logic
